metadata.title: Portfolio | Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Passionate Full Stack Developer. React, Next.js, Vue, Node.js, Laravel, Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker.

hero.description: I design and develop high-performance, elegant web applications, from front-end to back-end. Passionate about modern architectures and outstanding user experiences.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: A selection of projects that showcase my expertise in full stack development, from concept to production.

1.title: E-Commerce Platform
1.description: Complete e-commerce platform with shopping cart, Stripe payments and admin dashboard.
1.longDescription: Full-stack e-commerce application with authentication, catalog management, dynamic shopping cart, Stripe payment integration, and a comprehensive admin dashboard. Deployed on Vercel with Supabase for the database and Redis for caching.

2.title: Task Management App
2.description: Real-time project management application with Kanban boards.
2.longDescription: Collaborative task management tool inspired by Trello with drag-and-drop, real-time notifications via WebSockets, member assignment, advanced filters and multi-user sync. Express backend with MongoDB.

3.title: Blog CMS Headless
3.description: Complete headless CMS with Payload CMS, Astro frontend and Cloudflare deployment.
3.longDescription: Headless content management system using Payload CMS for the back-office with an ultra-fast Astro frontend. Automated deployment on Cloudflare Pages with CI/CD pipeline via GitHub Actions. Keystatic integration for inline editing.

4.title: Dashboard Analytics
4.description: Interactive dashboard with real-time data visualizations.
4.longDescription: Analytical dashboard with interactive charts, dynamic filters, report exports, smart notifications, and integration with multiple data sources. Built with Next.js, Supabase for real-time and Redis for caching.

5.title: API Microservices
5.description: Microservices architecture for social platform with real-time messaging.
5.longDescription: Microservices architecture for a social platform with algorithmic feed management, real-time messaging, follower system, push notifications and content moderation. Orchestrated with Docker and deployed via CI/CD GitHub Actions.

6.title: Portfolio Generator
6.description: Dynamic portfolio generator with headless CMS and automated deployment.
6.longDescription: SaaS application for creating custom portfolios with a visual editor, customizable themes, automatic SEO via Astro, content management with Keystatic and automatic deployment to Vercel or Cloudflare.

7.title: Real-time Chat App
7.description: Real-time chat application with WebSockets and push notifications.
7.longDescription: Real-time chat application with instant messaging system, push notifications, connected user management, and modern user interface. Built with React, Node.js, Express and Socket.IO.

8.title: Event Booking System
8.description: Event booking system with interactive calendar and online payment.
8.longDescription: Event booking system with interactive calendar, seat management, Stripe payment integration, and admin dashboard for event management. Built with Vue.js for the frontend and Laravel for the backend.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: A range of mastered technologies, from front to back, including databases and DevOps.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have a project in mind or an opportunity? Don't hesitate to reach out, I'd love to discuss it with you.
